website_summaries.verdict: A sleek case that can be carried separately. Best for those who travel light.
pros: Extendable handle lays flat while not in use
High-quality materials and construction make it feel sturdy and look professional
cons: Not much room for extra storage

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, sturdy handle
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely tremendous. Great feel, sturdy handle, gorgeous zippers that close tight and smooth. What they don’t show you is the zipper on the side pocket, which makes it a good spot for anything that likes to fall out of bags. The inside microfiber is awesome, and eye-catching, and if you don’t unzip fully you can open both the laptop and the cover and they will hold together. IF you like a tight fit, the 12-12.9 fits the MBP better. This one has enough extra room to fold when the computer is in.
customer_reviews.author: CALVIN C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: As others have reviewed the quality of the ProCase 12 is fantastic. I purchased this for my new iPad Pro with 12.9" screen and Smart Keyboard. I was worried the iPad with keyboard attached and charger + cord in the side pocket would prove to be too tight a fit for the ProCase. My worries were unfounded! This is a great case and the price is a steal. Get 'em while they're hot!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMan

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fits the new 2016 15 inch MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: The smaller dimensions of the brand new 15" MacBook Pro mean it will fit in some 13-inch laptop bags. I looked at the dimensions and ordered this, and sure enough it fits perfectly. It has a very nice soft padding on the inside and some foam protection. The outside pocket easily fits a power adapter, hard drive, and plenty of dongles. But best of all, this is just a nice simple, thin case to keep your laptop without all the extra bulk and a simple carry handle.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wardell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Surface Pro
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to carry my Surface Pro 6. The device (with pen attached) slides in perfectly to the sleeve and provides nice padding and protection for carrying it around without a lot of extra bulk. The handle is an added bonus for the sleeve makes it even more convenient for carrying. The side pocket easily holds my Arc Mouse, power brick, and wireless earphones as well. The accessories do create a little extra bulk to the overall footprint, but that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: ALC

customer_reviews.title: The computer sleeve to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, functional computer laptop sleeve. It fit my Lenovo C930 Yoga 2-1 computer which is 14". It is not overly fancy or ostentatious but it protects the computer, Its functional. It has a nice lining that won't scratch the computer and a nice zippered pocket attached to hold a charger and cleaning cloth. I have had it about a week and it works nicely. I like the fact that the covering can sit and the zippered pocket can unzip 180 degrees. I can leave the sleeve on the table and leave the compter in the covering without moving.
customer_reviews.author: mikenstein

customer_reviews.title: Worst Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Very sad because this is exactly what I needed. Fits everything I need and is perfect to carry. It only gets a star because of the service, I received it with a black mark on the front that won't come off and they will not replace it for free. Very disappointed in the service of this product and the fact I paid for a brand new item and got something with marks on it.
customer_reviews.author: Necole3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Samsung Notebook
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung Notebook 9 NP900X3N-K01US, described as a 13" notebook. The actual dimensions are 12.18"x 8.19".All the cases for 13" notebooks are too big. And then I found this one. I am delighted with it! The fit is perfect! The color (teal with medium brown trim) is very attractive, and the handle lies flat when not in use. It's constructed so you can use the notebook without removing it from the case, but I wonder about airflow for cooling, so I'll remove it for use. Measure your notebook. If it's less than 12.5" and you don't like excess room in the case, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: jsmithw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my iPad Pro 12.9
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and the slim profile. I perfectly fit's my iPad Pro 12.9 in it's protective TPU cover with pencil holder at the top. (Poetic Lumos iPad Pro 12.9 TPU Case Cover With [Keyboard Compatible][Pencil Holder]Ultra-Thin Impact Resistant Flexible Soft Transparent Case for Apple iPad Pro 12.9 (1st Gen 2015) Frosted Clear) I was having a difficult time finding a case that fits but isn't a struggle getting in and out. The only concern I have is that the zipper opens around the sides and bottom. If the zipper gives way.....I don't what to think about it. It seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie W.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced, cute, protective, fits, quick shipment!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very practical person. This sleeve was very reasonably priced and cute too. I like the orange trim on the grey - the grey is a little lighter in real life than on my computer screen but still a nice combination with the orange. I had no problems receiving the item and it fits my Surface Pro 4 with an adequate amount of cushion to protect it in transit :) Thank you for this great product and prompt shipment! Will be putting it to a lot of use with my frequent treks to the neighborhood coffee shop.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: That zipper!
customer_reviews.text: Like so many others have pointed out, this case has a serious design flaw. The zipper runs around the bottom of the case, opposite the direction of the zipper for the smaller compartment. I've lost track of the times I've left both open and spilled the contents inadvertently. Plus, that zipper does little to offer cushion on the bottom of the case, where your laptop would come into contact with the ground or a desk. So I have to be very careful about how I place this case, lest I dent up my MacBook. This case looks great, but it's all show and no go.
customer_reviews.author: Maz in RI

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this case for the Month and a Half it was functional until one day, without warning, the handle broke off on one of the sides. My computer would have likely been damaged if I didn't have a strong grip on the strap. The case is kind of useless now that the handle is broken since I was using it as a brief case... Other than this issue I would have given it more stars because I truly enjoyed it up until the strap broke.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kast

customer_reviews.title: The case is great! I noticed that the measurements for the 14-15
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 13-13.5 inch cover for my 15.6 dell xps 15-9550. The case is great! I noticed that the measurements for the 14-15.6 inch cover are way larger than my laptop. So I ordered one size down. It fits snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whoops! Contents on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and nicely designed case. The only issue I have, and for me it's a serious one, is the fact the case unzips upside down, while the pocket unzips right-side up. So, if you're trying to put your laptop (or in my case my Pixelbook and ASUS USB display), and you forgot to zip up the pocket, all the stuff in the pocket comes tumbling out. Plus you *cannot* forget to zip up your case, because if you do, the laptop will fall to the floor. IMO a fairly serious design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Chipp Walters

customer_reviews.title: Handle Broken One Year Later
customer_reviews.text: Bought a sleeve case which a year and a half later has a broken handle after minimal use. I use this at work once a month to carry a MacBook Pro laptop when I don't have other things to carry with it (adaptors, cords, etc. at which point I use a laptop bag). Handle slipped off and now case is useless since it's just a sleeve/cover without the convenience of being able to be carried like a bag. Contacted vendor and warranty only covers returns/exchanges after 180 days, which of course is not applicable in my case. Don't buy this product if you're looking for something durable in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier for 13.3" Surface Pro 4
customer_reviews.text: This 13-13.5" size is roomy for a 13.3" Surface Pro 4. If you have more than a power cord to store with it (i.e. travel mouse), this is a good choice. If you want a more snug fit for just the laptop in the main pouch and the power cord in the separate pouch with no other accessories, choose the smaller (12-12.5") size knowing it is SNUG. I have both and alternate between the two depending on what I need. I like that either fit well into my average sized backpack as a carry-on when traveling and that it doesn't add much bulk while offering more protection.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing case, check size using dimensions rather than diagonal length
customer_reviews.text: The case is amazing: durable, stylish, smooth zippers, soft interior, useful pocket, and retractable handle (best part). But DO NOT assume that a 14 inch laptop will fit perfectly in the 14 inch size case. Judge the size you need based on dimensions of the laptop compared to dimensions of the case. I have a 14 inch laptop and got the 13-13.5 case because I looked at the dimensions. It fits well enough for me, but the case is still slightly larger than the laptop. Other than this, the case itself is without question 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: however they look exactly like a toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancé who just purchased a Surface Pro 4 and this honestly feels very cheap. I saw pictures of the zipper from another customer and wanted to give this company the benefit of the doubt given the reviews its gotten, however they look exactly like a toy. Cheap plastic. I'm very disappointed that they would use this type of material. My fiancé works on a Navy ship and I seriously doubt this will even last her given the lack of quality. I would not recommend anyone to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald H

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy & Excellent Design
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect purchase fro what I wanted and needed. I have an Ipad Pro 12 inch with the keyboard attachment. I wanted to have a carrying case to secure when transporting but also to look sleek and not too bulky. I absolutely love this case as it is great design on color, overall look and feel! it fits my device nice and snug and is the best choice I could have made:-)))) I am a very happy and satisfied with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Preston Bellaire

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case for my non-Apple laptop
customer_reviews.text: This fits my laptop perfectly, with just enough extra room to let me keep my small USB plugged in the side. The inside is wonderfully smooth so I feel like my laptop is a little pampered while I'm carrying it. The zippered outside pocket is the perfect size to fit my charging cord. I love that it's zippered because I don't have to worry about the cord falling out when the case inevitably gets knocked over. The handle comes out when you use it and is flat when you don't need it, which I think is just cool.
customer_reviews.author: akahyperfriend

customer_reviews.title: Needs redesign.
customer_reviews.text: With only my MB Pro 13” in the case - nothing in the pocket - the zipper still catches on the interior. The lining has a thick seam along the edge and it adds too much bulk at the top and inhibits the zipper from closing. An extra few mm of space would not have compromised overall size but would have helped. Also, I have concerns whether the handle is secured well enough. Maybe but it seemed weak to me and I’m not trusting my $$$$ MB Pro to it. Black fabric with contrasting brown leather is cute but upon closer inspection the PU leather is a cheaper grade. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice for someone, maybe not for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice laptop case for someone. For me, I found it too stiff. The material is not nearly as flexible or fabric like, like I had expected. Another important note is the way the case is designed: instead of opening along the top where the handle is, case opens from side-bottom-side. Which means, if you were in a hurry and did not secure the zipper the entire way, it might decide to open enough to drop out while using the handle. A better design would have had a zipper opening only along the top, along with the handle, so even if it were left open by accident, the carrier would carry the laptop like a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Rampersad

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional Laptop Sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and well built. I'm loving this laptop sleeve and it has replaced my previous larger over the shoulder bag. For short business travel, this is great as I can simply use a backpack for clothes and slide this sleeve with minimal bulk and weight to carry items required for the remote office. There is just enough storage in the pocket for power cords, and adaptors, pens and mints. I've since purchased smaller organizers to place inside pocket so the pocket doesn't turn into a "purse" and digging through dozens of small items to find what I want. Thus, tip to ProCase add organizers into the sleeve and this bag would be perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: W. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Nice protective carrying case for laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a carrying case for my Windows surface 13.5 inch laptop. This is a very slim and lightweight laptop, that I take from home to work everyday. This Procase that i found is pretty ideal for my needs. It’s the perfect fit for my laptop, with little extra wiggle room. It is dark teal, with a brown trim and zipper. The zipper goes all the way around, except the top where the handle is. It is very nice and soft inside, lined with plush velvety material. The front has a large zipper pocket perfect for extra goods, like small notebook, phone and charger. This is a really nice carrying case for 13.5 inch laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Really good with caveats.
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice bag, like the color scheme, good zippers, nice handle, good storage pouch on the side. However, it does not have a shoulder strap. And there is decent (not superb) padding inside, there is no reinforced padding or protective corners on the bottom of the bag. But, I think it does provide adequate protection. I got the teal color and it looks sharp. The side pocket is big enough for a Bluetooth keyboard, depending on model. It can hold cases for your cables, earbuds, etc. I used it to hold my Bluetooth page turner.
customer_reviews.author: LikesAmazonStuffTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: This laptop case is well made of quality materials. I bought this to protect my 2018 MacBook Air. Although my laptop is only 13” this case is plenty big enough for up to 15”. The navy color is beautiful. The inside is lined with a soft “minky” type fabric. I cannot review on durability since I’ve only had it a few hours, but based on what I see of the construction it should last quite a while with care. This case is an amazing value. All the sleek good looks without the expensive price tag.
customer_reviews.author: ShariFromTX

customer_reviews.title: This thing is HUGE for a 13”
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 13-13.5” sleeve and my 13” laptop swims around in it. I’m not sure if I was sent the wrong size, but it certainly doesn’t hold my laptop snugly or efficiently, what with the 2-3” of surrounding wasted space. However, the material is durable, colorful, and attractive, and the interior is bunny soft. The outside pockets, while small, are usable for cables and pens (although any bulky power blocks will add heft to its slim design and thus defeat the purpose). I do recommend the item—and I also recommend double checking the size before you throw all the packaging away.
customer_reviews.author: Egyptienne

customer_reviews.title: Color is great, quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: We initially purchased the larger case for a 13.5 laptop and the case was too large. We returned the first case and ordered the smaller one even though it was supposed to be too small for a 13.5" laptop, but the laptop fits into this case perfectly snug. Color is great, quality is excellent, a professional looking case for sure. If you want to be able to carry some papers, or maybe a book or inside the zipper part of the case, buy the larger one for a 13.5" laptop, but if you want the laptop to fit nice and snug and feel safer, the medium is the case you want.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop case
customer_reviews.text: My laptop is on the high end of the size limit for this case, which resulted in a perfectly snug fit. It doesn't move around at all in there. The case is very soft and plush on the inside. The storage pocket is large enough to fit the charger, a pen, and a slim wireless mouse. A couple other small items could probably be squeezed in too. The handle is sturdy. The case is lightweight but seems durable. It looks nice and is way better for me than a shoulder bag. I haven't tested out the water resistance, so hopefully moving it from car to building in an unexpected South Florida thunderstorm won't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Case is soft and protective, but all the weight is on the zipper!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this case as a sleeve for a new MacBook Pro 16". The case fits the computer well and is padded, but when we got the case we discovered that if one was to carry the computer in this case using the built-in handle, the computer would be riding on the zipper instead of folded cloth. While the sipper is perfectly fine for being opened and closed repeatedly and riding in a backpack, it's not made for bearing the weight of a computer with every step. This is a poor design, don't order this case if you're looking to use it as your primary laptop bag, you definitely want another bag to carry this!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyThunder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Surface Pro 4.
customer_reviews.text: I use this case daily for my Microsoft Surface Pro 4. It fits the computer perfectly and I can put the power supply and a mouse in the front zipper pocket. Some reviewers were concerned about the main compartment zipper going all the way around the case - that their computer may fall out. This has not been an issue for me. I only unzip it from the side and it's not a problem. The handle and case are durable the the inside is lined with a soft material that also cushions the device. I highly recommend this case for a Surface Pro 4.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and perfect bag for 12 inch laptops
customer_reviews.text: After trying many sleeve bags for my new Lenovo Yoga 11e laptop this one worked perfect for me. The zippered complartment stores the power supply and cables well. Main compartment provides a snug, soft protection for my laptop while traveling. This bag not only looks very nice and stylish but well designed. It even fits on my Rick Steves shoulder travel bag which is a plus for me. My only complaint is the external zipper is burried to deep with a flap for style purposes. It takes small effort to open the zipper but this is a very small complaint. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sezen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Chromebooks in backpacks!
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! We got it for my relatively small first grader because the school is issuing every student a Chromebook that they are carrying back and forth to school each day. I wanted a case that would easily fit inside her backpack and protect the chromebook. She loves the color and is super happy it has an extra zipper pocket and a handle! Highly recommend! It's very soft on the inside and provides plenty of padding without being bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop sleeve for my HP machine
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Perfect for my HP laptop at the office. The office gave me a rather large, padded briefcase to lug the laptop around in when I travel, but it's not big enough for my other carry-on items. Now I can protect the laptop with this case and then carry it in my backpack, along with my other items - plenty of room, and only one bag to carry. This sleeve is well made and seems like it will last a while. While not really a negative, I will say that the brown handle is useless for me. I don't have any plans to ever carry this thing around like a briefcase. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my Surface Pro 6
customer_reviews.text: How the story unfolds... I purchased my Surface Pro 6. Ended up getting a folding case/stand which worked perfectly. Three further thoughts resulted in me purchasing the 12-12.9" Pro case. a) I wanted something that protected all around, b) something that could also hold my charger, c) something with a handle. This case was exactly what I was looking for. There's sufficient protection to satisfy my anxious nature, the fit with the folding case is great; there's about 1/4 on all sides. The quality of the case is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon J Gana

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop Bag, Nice Color, Easy for Everyday Use
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a laptop bag, this is perfect for lightweight laptops. Love this strap, carrying it has the professional feel. Much better than wearing a backpack. I haven't used it enough to judge it's durability but I'd say it's a solid bag while I've been bringing it to work 3 times a week. I think 15' laptops have a better feel since carrying it with a 14' feels a bit small. It doesn't rattle back and forth with all the empty space which is definitely a plus. I am using it with my Thinkpad yoga which is a 14' laptop and I've been loving this bag so far.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Came as Pictured - Perfect Case!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the grey with mint lining case and it fits my 15.6 inch gaming laptop perfectly! Feels durable and well-built. Cushions my laptop and opens and closes easily. The side zipper pouch is perfect for earphones/airpods, a charger and even an external mouse, but also perfectly sized for documents, notes or writing utensils. Not built for water or drop protection, so buyer beware! If you're a bit rougher with your laptop, find a harder case. This one is strictly for light travelling and protection. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Really nice case, lots of handy features
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice case for my laptop. I wanted something protective but not bulky. Very light weight. The pocket outside is just right for the power cord and tight enough the cord can’t fall out. The handle flattens out if you need a smooth edge, to fit in a suitcase or on a shelf. The best part is the zipper goes all the way around 3 sides making it so easy to get in and out of the case. I keep my laptop in it even at home to keep it dust free, protected from scratches, wear and tear. I love the color too, it is exactly as shown in the picture. Don’t know about waterproof yet.
customer_reviews.author: lucyb

customer_reviews.title: ie=UTF8&psc=1 And it just fits in this ProCase perfect. Almost a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: So I got this case for my new iPad Pro 12.9" which is installed in a bulky case with a built in screen saver and it just barely fits. But it fits!!! It's well padded on the sides. It's a little strange to be installing my iPad from the bottom and zipping up, but it works. It seems well made. We'll see how it holds up and if anything changes down the road, I'll report it. So my iPad is installed in this protected case.  And it just fits in this ProCase perfect. Almost a perfect fit. I can zip it up just fine. Any larger and I would have issues zipping it.
customer_reviews.author: JBDragon

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was a 14" Option
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for my 14" HP Chromebook (I already own one for my Samsung Chromebook Pro and love it). However, the size for this is jut a bit too much. If only there was a size between the 13.5" and the 15.6". There are more and more laptops in the 14" range and to have a case that doesn't work for them specifically just seems silly. Other than the sizing issue, this case is amazing! It looks like it works perfectly for Macbooks, but if you're picking it up for a 14" laptop, ya might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Era

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but Dangerous Design
customer_reviews.text: Clean neat lines on the exterior, padded faux fur lining of the interior, hidden exterior pocket for cables and accessories, full lie-flat opening attracted me to purchase this product in 2017. However as Bree_s (7/2018) and Maz in RI (12/2018) have written, the zipper opens AWAY from the handle. So if you're in a rush and not zip the case entirely around, or, if the zipper breaks, your LAPTOP MAY FALL OUT FROM THE BOTTOM as you grasp handle !! I will have to make modifications sewing in some safety straps per Noor (10/2018) suggestion . This should be an easy improvement for the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Miko

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Love the case, its padded enough so if you bump into the something your laptop or tablet doesn't get damaged. The zipper compartment in the front is so handy for your cords and mouse or things you need to carry with you. I would have given this case a 5 star had it not been for the strong chemical smell when it first arrived. Customer service suggested washing the case to remove the smell. It worked a bit and over a short period of time the smell did go away, but I shouldn't have had to wash a new product in order to use it. But other than that I love the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice case and it fits my laptop perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for my 15 inch Dell Laptop! I previously bought a different case but had to return it because even though it said it was for a 15 inch laptop, the zipper would not go around the square corners of my computer. So I ordered this case as a replacement and it's perfect!! It fits my computer perfectly. It has a very soft interior lining. And the outside seems like a nice durable material. I have not traveled with it yet, but I feel pretty confident it will help keep my laptop protected.
customer_reviews.author: Liv D.

customer_reviews.title: convenient but minimal and one concern
customer_reviews.text: The case does indeed fit the Surface Pro. Soft interior, paddded. there is an external pocket, although minimal. You can only fit the tablet and the power supply in this case. But it takes up little space which is good. One major concern is that the zippered opening is along the bottom of the case, with the handle on the top. If the zipper were to fail for any reason, the tablet could drop out and be damaged. Wish the zipper was on top along with the handle. I have never seen a design like this.
customer_reviews.author: David Koot

customer_reviews.title: Great colorful case
customer_reviews.text: Great tote! I am using it with a Gigabyte Aero 15, a 15.6-inch laptop with no screen bezel, so the dimensions are 14x10, and it fits with absolutely NO room to spare. But the point is that it fits! The orange trim also works with the Gigabyte's orange theme, so it's a win-win. The interior is reasonably protective, but there is no protection for the sides where the zipper is. Not that one would expect this to be a tough case, but padding is not extended to the zippered area. The side pocket is small and of limited use with a laptop in the case. Maybe paperwork, credit cards, or something very flat. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: DrAtomic

customer_reviews.title: Nice slim laptop case
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this case. It's slim, has ample cushion inside and an end-to-end side pocket that is just big enough for a power cord and mouse without being too bulky. The only reason for 4/5 stars is the zipper; it runs along the bottom of the case. This will probably (I hope) never be an issue but from a design standpoint having a zipper at the primary load-bearing point could potentially be risky. That said, a laptop isn't very heavy and the zipper appears to be strong.
customer_reviews.author: zed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for
customer_reviews.text: Purchased ProCase 14 - 15.6 Inch Laptop Sleeve Case Protective Bag because I need something compact to leave at work instead of my backpack or laptop case which can be very bulky. I don't bring my work laptop home everyday and I could bring my laptop backpack and leave it at work but then sometimes i need it for my personal laptop and it takes too much space. This bag is the perfect solution. it doesn't take too much space in my cube, it's cute and serves it's purpose when I need to take my work laptop home. It also help protect my laptop inside my under the seat luggage when i travel.
customer_reviews.author: LilNessa

customer_reviews.title: Quality Case
customer_reviews.text: The original case I purchased with my Surface Pro 3 bundle was ugly but functional. Both zippers failed and I decided to finally get a nice case for my portable. I really like it. The lining is plush and protective. It has a generous zipper compartment for peripherals. And the handle is nice for carrying. It's a little bigger than I needed, but that's OK. It fits nicely inside my briefcases, or can be carried on its own when I don't need files or paperwork. It's attractive and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: nice case but bad design for me
customer_reviews.text: The case opening is upside down in my mind. Lifting it by the handle results in laptop falling out the bottom unless it's zipped up. Even though I noticed this before using it I still managed to have my Mac slip out as i went to pick up the case. Not only does it open upside down but the zipper compartment is also upside down. Otherwise it's a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Handle and zipper compartment
customer_reviews.text: Overall material is wonderful. nice padding but the handle should be on the zipper closure side, it is dangerous if you grab the handle and the zipper is not completely closed the laptop will slide out, I never open it all the way because of this, I can only use it for travel and not work because of this fear. Also, the side zipper compartment should be able to expand somewhat to fit the charger in it, the compartment is too tight and will smash the laptop if you place anything other than a piece of paper in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - Great Price - Fits and Protects Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This case stood up to all my expectations. It is affordable, sleek, sturdily built, and fits my 13.1" Dell Inspiron 5379 8th gen i7 2-in-1 laptop perfectly. It has a soft interior so I don't have to worry about scratches, and the zippers are really nice. There is a front zipper compartment that can store smaller items like USB sticks, cables, and earbuds. The handle is nice as well because it extends like it shown in the photo when you pick it up, but when you aren't using the handle, it can slip back in and lay flat. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Also fits 13" apple pro 2018
customer_reviews.text: I had to order it twice. Although it does not say it, because the apple pro 2018 is so thin, it fits the 12.9 inch cover. Unfortunately the description does not say that and advises ordering the next size up, which I did the first time. I was disappointed that it was so much bigger and took a chance ordering the 12.9 which is a great fit. Buyers should be advised that the 12.9 fits in easily with a thin laptop, especially because of the all around zipper which I like. There is no difficulty zipping it up.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Simple bag, simple price, worth it
customer_reviews.text: Been testing it for 2 weeks now and have to say it’s way better than most carrying cases I’ve used. I love how light and simple it is. I’m going paperless as a student this year so I use the 15.6 bag for my 12.9 iPad Pro. Decided, at the time, the prices were the same so why not go bigger but then I also realized, it doesn’t move around that much even though it is bigger. Since it is bigger I can store more in the front pocket and I placed a micro fiber towel with the iPad for cleaning (also helps keep the iPad from moving). It was wort it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Elrasoul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laptop bag for basic needs!
customer_reviews.text: This case fits my new Dell XPS 15 2 in 1 PERFECTLY with room for the power cord, USB-3.0 adapter and slim mouse in the zipper pocket on the side. Love the subtle color accent and collapsible handle too. There is enough padding for me to feel secure transporting it but not too much that it feels or looks bloated. Prob don't want to drop it on the corner, but that's not the sort of damage this product claims to withstand. I highly recommend this bag if you confirm the dimensions work for your computer! Very glad I purchased it. (Note, I did not receive any compensation for this review -- just another dude paying it forward!)
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough nice things about this. For the price, you’re getting a handy, nicely protected carrying case. I bought it for a pixelbook, it fits like a glove. It includes a front zipper pocket that holds a charger nicely without much added bulk. The inside is lined with a soft cloth for added protection. I love the carrying handle as well. The color I purchased is a darker teal than the display, and the border is a brown color, not so orange as it appears here. I consider those things a plus, as a guy. For anyone with a 11-12.3” laptop you cannot go wrong buying this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for My 2018 12.9" iPad Pro & Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Very well made case, though the "leathery" coating of the handle is peeling off. My iPad charger and cables fit well in the side zipper pocket. The iPad itself is held safe in the cushioned case. Had tried other sleeves, cases, etc for the big iPad, but this has worked out to be the best option for me. Had a hard time finding this on Amazon initially. My daughter has this case for her iPad and I wanted the same. Hope they don't stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: Meyers Family

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little case with room enough for a Macbook plus cables and a mouse. It's attractive with a slim profile, bright color and provides adequate protection for minor bumps. When it comes to durability, however, that leaves something to be desired. After using the case (regular use, no extreme sports or anything crazy) for about 4 months, the zipper came apart at the corner. The company provides a 30 day warranty which is pretty pathetic. My additional issue with the bag is that it opens from the bottom which is especially bad when the zipper gives up and out spills the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret T.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for better
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Has nice padding that keeps your laptop safe during the traveling and backpack use during college. Case is a tad larger than my laptop and fit in my backpack a little snug but I wouldn't buy anything else to protect my laptop. Also has a great zipper in the front for simple headphones or phone charger but carrying your computer charger in it can cause it to be a bit bulky. I hope it takes a while until I will need a new one but I would just buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the Lenovo Yoga 910 15.6" laptop. I love the color and although many were surprised it was orange and not brown I read the reviews going into the purchase and I love the colors. It is a very sleek bag and the inside is a soft material that won't scratch the laptop. I think the handle being flat while not in use is great. The only downside of this sleeve is the zipper unzips at the bottom not the top. Not a big deal as I bring one zipper around all the way so there's no way of it accidentally unzipping from the bottom and falling out. Great product and recommended to anyone that needs a lightweight sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W

customer_reviews.title: Massive design problem
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived quickly, and felt like a quality product. The inner lining was soft and felt very protective. I wish I had paid more attention to one important aspect of this case though, then I might not have destroyed my laptop 12 hours after this product arrived. The zipper/opening is on the underside. The laptop was placed in the bag, not fully zipped. The zipper worked its way open, the laptop crashed to the ground, and is now useful only as a paper weight. Fantastic, just perfect, I got this to protect my laptop - how wonderfully ironic. Returned, with much haste. I would avoid any case that does not open at the top - obviously!
customer_reviews.author: A. Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate sizing
customer_reviews.text: The 13-13.5 inch size case is more appropriately a 15 inch size case. My 13 inch MacBook Pro swims inside this case. Seller really needs to update their sizing and advertising information to more correctly reflect real world sizes. Essentially a useless case for me.
customer_reviews.author: tw

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: My son’s school issues mandatory laptops but of course no case comes with it. Plus, they make you pay for any damages so I needed a case for my son ASAP. This case is sleek and fits his small laptop perfectly. He stores the charger in the front zipper pocket. It’s sleek enough to fit in his backpack with no issues. The handle is showing signs of wear but I’m not worried about that. He just needed a case with a little padding to hopefully prevent any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This ProCase is lightweight, sturdy and made very well. It does a good job protecting my laptop, while traveling as it fits nicely in my carry on. I especially like the zippered pocket on the front that is large enough to hold my charger and other accessories. Because the main zipper goes around three sides, I am able to leave the computer in it while I am working. I have the teal one with brown trim and love how it looks. I purchased this one because my daughter has one and recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Bischoff

customer_reviews.title: A little too big for Levono 14" Carbon X1
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find the right size case as stated size (ie 14") has only minor relevance to the physical size of a computer. The first case I bought for my 14" computer was waayyy too big. This looked like a great case and the measurements sounded good, but the case was large enough that my laptop slid around inside. Had it been slightly smaller, I would have kept it. Some cases listings have no measurements - I didn't even look at those listings.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy - the nicest iPad Pro holder I have found.
customer_reviews.text: The case makes you feel confident your iPad Pro is safe and secure. I was a little unsure about the downward facing zipper but it is sturdy. I wanted something stylish and the look of this is very nice - I love the grey flannel appearance. It does not add a lot of bulk but feels cushioned so I can put my iPad Pro in a large handbag and not worry about scratches or a bit of jostling doing any damage. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Surface
customer_reviews.text: I bought another cover for the Microsoft Surface 6 but what any cover which is used as a flip case which does not allow the passive cooling to work is a no go. This carry bag is perfect and well padded. The keyboard with the surface provides adequate protection in general but this carry case is great. It unzips a full 180 degrees and has a neat carry handle. I cannot comment on its water resistance, but the rest of the build is great for the price. I travel/fly a lot, so this will be easy to get out and zip open.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hughes

customer_reviews.title: The actual size of the 14" - 15.6" model is too big for a 15" MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: The description says that the 14" - 15.6" version is for a 15" MacBook Pro. Unfortunately, the actual size is only "roughly" the size of a MacBook Pro. It's actually 2.5" longer and 1.5" wider than a 15" MacBook Pro (2017). I want a cover that actually fits my laptop nicely without wasting all that space when I put it in my backpack. You need to order the 13 - 13.5" model which should fit the 15" MacBook Pro more snugly. I just ordered it and will see how that works. Otherwise it's very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Erik P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop case
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a case for our new 15in HP laptop. When I came upon ProCase, I knew my search was over. It had all the features that I was looking for. A well made padded case with a handle that would accommodate the laptop and a zippered compartment on the outside to store the charger and cable. When it arrived, it exceeded my expectations. I am very happy with this purchase. I would definitely recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Dee shop

customer_reviews.title: 5 inch to see which fits better. The 12-12
customer_reviews.text: High quality with thick padding. Quick delivery. We bought for Lenovo Yoga 720 13.3" We bought the 12-12.9 and the 13-13.5 inch to see which fits better. The 12-12.9 fits perfectly for the 13.3 yoga. The larger one would work also but with a little extra room for it to slide around. I like the smaller one instead. I will keep both because of the great quality and low price. I will use the older laptop for an older model laptop I still have.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my new Microsoft Surface Pro 6 when I am traveling. I really liked that the inside is padded and the outside material is waterproof. I also really like that the zipper opens on 3 sides, so it is very easy to put the laptop in and take it out of the case. The outside pocket is great for the mouse and power cords since it also has a zipper closure. I am very happy with this case and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: good high quality case
customer_reviews.text: the case is very good and very soft and protected, you can tell that it's made with care and high quality, although the 13 inch case is way too big for my MacBook Pro 2017 13 inch. I just wish there is something to hold it up when you use the laptop so that way the case doesn't just fall flat onto the desk. I know that it's not made for that but I just wish I can use in that purpose, because I wish I can just open up my laptop and still in the case and somehow the top would hold up with the front of the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Koolkid

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This case surpassed my expectations. It is nicely made of quality looking materials. I have not used it yet so cannot judge its durability. I gave it 3 stars for versatility because the outer pocket is too tight to use for a mouse/or charger. It isn't big enough for a full size sheet of paper. I ordered the 13.5 size for a 14 inch laptop and it fits perfectly. Perhaps if I had gone a size larger there would have been more give in the outer pocket. Nonetheless I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Net shopper

customer_reviews.title: Saved my laptop's life.
customer_reviews.text: When I go out, I keep my surface pro inside this bag, which does into another bag (that is not padded). One day I tripped on some cement stairs and one of my knees landed on the bag. The surface pro was just fine and suffered no damage. Even the knee that fell on it suffered no damage. But my other knee that I fell on was another thing. I fell so hard on the cement that my knee bone was bruised and still months later, is still healing. So I can say for sure that I am happy to have this save my surface pro. Is there a version for my knees?
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for the new 2018 21.9in iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: As this is the first iPad I have had with an Apple Pencil (even though it connects magnetically on to the top of the iPad), I have been worried about traveling with it without having a case to keep it safe. This case is well padded, fits the large iPad with the pencil perfectly, and has a nice handle when you want to carry it around on its own. It has a nice pouch, where you could put in your power cord if you like. I also like that there were several colors to choose from - I got the gray one with orange trim and know I made the right choice
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Need It For
customer_reviews.text: I have the Lenovo Yoga 930 and I was looking for a bag to compliment this beautiful laptop and I found it. I feel the bag is a little big but I was concerned that the next size down would not have fit. But regardless, I'm glad that I got this bag. The quality is actually really good and I feel the bag will protect my laptop when traveling. The only thing I wish it had was a strap inside to keep the laptop in place. But otherwise I'm glad that I came across this and purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I needed and was hoping for....
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time looking at the available cases on Amazon and decided that this one looked good. I made a good choice !! This case is very well made - the quality of the materials, the excellent stitching and overall workmanship, the quality of the zipper (so important for something like this) make this an excellent product. I needed it for an 11" Lenovo Ideapad and it fits perfectly with some room to spare for some small items like pens. I have not yet tried putting the charger in the outside pouch, but I think that it will fit..... I would buy this case again !!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking item and well made
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. Using it for my 10.5 iPad with special keyboard. Handle makes it nice for travel. Padding in case is good. The zipper is my only concern as it zips all the way around the bottom of case and I worry a little about it coming unzipped or my not getting it zipped completely and iPad falling out. However, zipper seems well made and have had no problems. Very happy with purchase of this item
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for our Chromebook (which measures 12" x 8.25").  Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: Great fabric, tough on the inside but very soft and velvety interior. Reasons I rated it 4 stars instead of 5: 1) The pocket is very slim, and anything other than a very small, flat-type mouse would not fit. 2) The handle on top means that it could be picked up in a hurry while unzipped, and the Chromebook would fall out the bottom. Neither of these reasons made us want to return the bag, though. It's got a nice and slim profile, handy size and not a bulky handle/strap, and it looks good!
customer_reviews.author: PFNature

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel, poor for protection
customer_reviews.text: I really like this carrying case for my Surface Pro 3. It fits the laptop itself, and the pen when it is in its holder while it is in the main compartment. The front pouch fits the charging cable, Arc mouse, and an extra charging cable for my phone easily. My only complaint is that it doesn't have any drop protection. While the inside is definitely not going to mark the screen or outside of the laptop in any way, impact is going to some damage. Fortunately, I haven't dropped it yet, and because of the overall weight of the product, I don't think I'm ever going to have to worry about me dropping it.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Durable, used it for a year for 12.5 inch Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the aqua/turquoise border with gray body. I've been using it for about a year to protect my ASUS 12.5 inch Chromebook. It does a good job of protecting the laptop with modest amounts of padding, while remaining tight fitting. (Granted, it is not a hard case so will not protect against significant crushing forces.) Zipper is reliable and handle is sturdy. The handle has an elastic extension so it has some give when it needs to but can also be tucked in and have a lower profile when need be.
customer_reviews.author: Deron Baker

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Broke Within a Month of Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my new Google Pixel Book. The fit was excellent and it seemed like a good quality case. School started August 29th and by September 27th the zipper was broken! I contacted the seller. Seller would not replace. They only offered me a 30% discount on my next purchase. I definitely won't be doing that nor will I be taking them up on their offer. Products should last more than a month. Poor customer service- poor quality sleeve case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent case; Don't rely on the handle!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good case if you need to put your tablet in another bag with others things inside it like a backpack, briefcase or suitcase. The protection on the edge of the case is really thin. It basically is just the zipper that protects the edge. The padding on the flat sides of it is pretty solid and the lining is soft on the inside. The big deal breaker for me on this case is that the handle started cracking in half pretty badly as you can see. I try not to use it anymore since it's a tiny bit of leatheroleum away from splitting in half.
customer_reviews.author: Tito

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what I needed as a student. It is padded thickly but not so thick that it adds unnecessary bulk to my backpack. There is a zippered pocket which fits my charger and USB-C adaptor and the handle is a nice touch for grabbing my laptop and running out of the classroom. I ordered the 13"inch case for my 2018 MacBook Air and it fits just right with some extra room. The slate gray & aqua trim are cute and bright. I purchased a used one that was "amazon approved" with black stains all over it so after returning it and spending a few more $ for a brand new one, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: the zipper runs along the bottom
customer_reviews.text: The case is handsome, but I'm not sure I trust it. The zipper runs along the bottom. So if you are carrying your computer and the plastic zipper fails, your computer could fall out. I assume, mistakenly, that the zipper is along the top. The case also smells a bit chemically. I didn't expect perfection for the price. It's good if you are just putting it into a backpack or other bag.
customer_reviews.author: Robbi Eklow

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop cover for my new 15.6 HP Envy 360 (model 15M-CN0012DX). It’s slightly big so if you’re looking for a snug fit this is not it. However I don’t mind it at all as I’ll likely be carrying this bag inside of another bag (backpack). The cover has a canvass type feel on the outside and a soft, plush feel on the inside. There’s an outside pocket that can store a mouse, mousepad, and other things. The handle seems sturdy. If anything changes I’ll update this review. Let me know if this helps! (note: I purchased the keyboard cover separately here on Amazon)
customer_reviews.author: Candidly Cristal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good padding and soft
customer_reviews.text: Giving it 4 stars bc I don’t like that end of the zipper doesn’t align with the handle. In other words if you happen to not close the zipper all the way and grab the handle, there is a possibility of your laptop falling out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, but pocket zippers placed awkwardly
customer_reviews.text: It’s a well-padded bag that fits my Surface Pro really well, plus a side pocket for accessories. I knocked off one star from my rating because the zipper for the accessory pocket is on the opposite side of the laptop opening. If both pockets are open, then my mouse and power cord fall out while I’m sliding the laptop into the main pocket. Vice-versa if I’m putting away the mouse or power cord.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Zipper got damaged after ~1 month
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of this product. However, after about a month of using it the zipper got damaged for no apparent reason and it now gets stuck at one spot. I simply have to zip from the other side and leave a small opening at the point where the zipper isn't functioning. Just a slight annoyance, especially that it happened so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: David A

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Practical!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve/case is very nice. The color is what attracted me to it during my search; the price made it even more appealing, and the features sealed the deal. I'm happy to say that when the item arrived, it fulfilled all my hopes for the product. The full unzlip feature allows the sleeve to open flat, which is nice; the wide border around the edge that becomes the handle is nice because it slides back in when not being used as a handle. The inside is soft and cushiony, and the pocket on the outside is non-obtrusive but allows for storage of extra items. I rarely travel with my Chromebook, but when I do, this will be a great companion!
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Won't Protect the Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This was alright. Just a thin fabric and it won't protect your laptop against dings or drops. It can protect it against scratches for sure. It's alright it's just thin and not really the best quality but works okay as long as you put it in your backpack. Other than that, just make sure you don't drop it because the cushion is definitely not enough for electronic devices.
customer_reviews.author: PleasantCookIeMonster

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Travel With
customer_reviews.text: Of course TSA wants everything visible and I invariably end up taking several trays for all the little electronics I carry onboard with me; but also, this case makes getting through airport security less painful. And I like the size--it fits perfectly under the plane seats so I can keep everything close by. The zipper closing seems to be quite durable; though, I can't testify to the quality of rain resistance yet. I do like the padded case--I feel great about the protection it affords my laptop. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: present for school age great granddaughter for school work due to school shut down
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived intact with cover and computer together instead of separately as my order stated. Great granddaughter was very surprised and said she loves it. Apparently everything is fine but since I live in another state I have not seen the products myself. I can't give stars for above categories because she just received it and I do not know the answers. However at this point I would order the package again. Very easy process after I did my own research on products.
customer_reviews.author: MsNinaJ2

customer_reviews.title: This Case fits my HP 15.6in Gaming Laptop perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new case for my HP Gaming Laptop and also hold a Car mouse and the power cord. This nice looking colorful case fits the bill. The inside is plush and very soft so it wont scratch the outside of my laptop. Had to give it 4 stars as one of the zippers its stuck while try to use it about half way around, no biggy but cant give it a 5 star cause it should all work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: THXkid

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because my old one was falling apart and I needed a handle and additional pocket to store my charger. I used this for my 13in MacBook Pro while I did air travel recently and it worked great. My laptop was fully protected, I was able to hold it by the handle the entire time without issues, and the pocket for my charger was also helpful. The only thing wth the pocket is that I had to unravel my charger bc when it was rolled up properly, it was very bulky in the pocket which made it hard to zip. This was not a big deal though. I’m happy with the case and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alé

customer_reviews.title: Appears to have good quality and fits a 14" Lenovo with room to spare.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be good quality. Padding seems adequate as well. Time will tell how well it performs. Was a little surprised (negatively) that the opening of the zipper is at the bottom of the pouch rather than the top -- meaning it is opposite from the handles. This means that if the zipper breaks for whatever reason, the pouch will become unusable. Also it means than when carrying by the handles, gravity pulls laptop down towards the zipper, creating some stress, and presumably bottom is not padded.
customer_reviews.author: Zorglub

customer_reviews.title: If you are searching for a protective computer sleeve, buy this one now!
customer_reviews.text: This product has great reviews for a reason. It is well built and looks high quality as well. The inside is soft and padded. When I put my $1000 laptop in, I am confident that it will be protected. My previous laptop was in my backpack when I dropped it and cracked the screen. I am positive that if I would've had my previous computer in this case, I would still be using it today. It does what it is meant to do and it does it well. Very happy with this product and I would definitely recommend it to anyone in the same situation.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This case is designed quite differently than a typical laptop case. The zipper is on the bottom of the case - opposite the handle. It's very easy to forget that: put your laptop in the case and if you don't close the zipper your computer falls out on the floor when you pick it up. I'm returning the one I ordered. Not worth the risk of damaging an $1100 laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Garden Girl

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the zipper.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 12-12.9 inch for my 13 MBP. It fits perfectly. I really love the inside, nice cushion, soft and fuzzy. But the zipper(around the corner) broke on my first trip carrying it. I checked the other corner that hadn't broken yet and found the fabric was becoming much thinner than other area. It looks like the zipper wears out the brown fabric pretty easily. I really liked other parts of this bag though. Wish the zipper was made better. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Cosima

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality product for a good price, but strap needed to protect device
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this case for my wife's Surface Book and it fits nicely. It is a little bigger, but that's, fine I believe. She believes the case looks professional, but thinks the orange is a little too bright. Her real complaint however, is that it should have one of those elastic straps to secure the device. Right now it can slip right out if you forget to zip immediately and then lift upon to case. is happened to my wife. thankfully the chair was there, so it fell on it.
customer_reviews.author: Oren Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it’s alright. I returned mine though.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like how only the iPad fits inside this. Nothing else, no case, no pencil. I guess if this is the only thing you want to carry with your iPad that’s fine. But if you have a case or anything you’ll need a bigger bag or another bag. It’s better to just get a different bag that doesn’t open from the bottom and has excess pockets for other things you may carry on you. Like the apple pencil
customer_reviews.author: Shapeless

customer_reviews.title: Nice materials - potentially flawed design
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple but soft sleeve for my new iPad Pro 12.9. This seemed to be the right balance. It's well made. The interior is soft and won't scratch and the zippers are nylon/plastic so they won't scratch either. One design choice bothers me. The sleeve unzips and opens on bottom and sides and folds at top where handles are. If one is not careful and you don't zip up the case immediately, you might forget and grab the handle to pick it up. If you forget to close the zipper, your tablet/computer falls out. I should have looked closer to see how this zipped. Going to have to find another sleeve. Too much chance for human error.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jordan

product_meta.title: ProCase 13-13.5 Inch Sleeve Case Cover for MacBook Pro 2019 2018 2017 2016/Surface Laptop 2017/Book 3 13.5" 15", Laptop Slim Bag for 13" 13.3" Lenovo Dell Toshiba HP ASUS Acer Chromebook -Black
product_meta.description: Size:13 - 13.5 Inch| Color:BlackProCase meets your every expectation for a laptop/tablet case bag. ****************************************** there are one extra pocket in front. It is convenient to keep pens, mobile phone, cables, chargers, power bank etc. The sleeve is slim and lightweight and will not bulk your laptop up and can easily slide into your briefcase, backpack, or other bag. This tablet/laptop case is built with materials and can avoid scratches, absorb bump and shock by the super soft interior layers and water-resistant layers exterior. They are degradable and durable. The sleeve bag can be fully opened at 180°, which easily access your tablet/laptop. **************************************** Case compatibility: surface Laptop/ surface Book, 13" MacBook Pro (Retina)
